entries.name: Abacus
entries.description: A wooden frame with beads that slide on rods.

entries.name: Ball of yard
entries.description: Balled yard that can be in a variety of colors.

entries.name: Barrel
entries.hidden properties: [STEALTH 12] Small creature can hide in a barrel easily.  Medium creature can squat in a barrel, but the lid could not close entirely.
entries.properties: Can usually hold 120 liters (30 gallons) of liquid.
entries.description: Sealed wooden container made of curved staves and metal rings.  Sealed with a lid or cork.

entries.name: Basket
entries.description: Woven cane or wood shaped to carry small objects.

entries.name: Book
entries.description: Simple leather book with any possible record written inside.

entries.name: Broom
entries.hidden properties: [ARCANA 15] Brooms are easier to enchant with a fly spell than other common items.

entries.name: Bucket
entries.properties: Can hold a 4 liters (1 gallon) of liquid.
entries.description: Wooden bucket wrapped in iron bands with a wooden handle.

entries.name: Chest
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 12] Can be burst with a melee weapon and 15 STR check.
entries.properties: Can hold 1 ft by 3 ft worth of supplies.
entries.description: Wooden chest with an iron lock and frames.

entries.name: Clothes (fine)
entries.description: Finely sewn colorful cloth full-body clothing.

entries.name: Clothes (extravagant)
entries.description: Masterfully sewn intricate silk and cloth full-body clothing.

entries.name: Iron chest
entries.hidden properties: [INSPECTION 15] Can be burst with a melee weapon and 25 STR check.
entries.properties: Can hold 1 ft by 3 ft worth of supplies.

entries.name: Glass bottle
entries.properties: Can hold a liter of liquid.
entries.description: A glass bottle, usually stopped with a cork.

entries.name: Hourglass
entries.properties: Keeps an accurate measurement of an hour.
entries.description: A wooden frame that holds two glass vials half full of fine sand.

entries.name: Jug
entries.description: A wooden container with a pouring spout and handle.

entries.name: Ladder
entries.properties: Can be placed against a wall to reach an extra 10 ft.
entries.description: A wooden ladder that stands 10 ft tall.

entries.name: Lamp
entries.properties: Can be lit and produce 30 ft radius of light for 1 hour.
entries.description: A clay lamp that is filled with oil and has a hempen wick.

entries.name: Pitcher
entries.description: A brass container with a pouring spout and handle.

entries.name: Tankard
entries.description: A brass cup with a curved handle.
